text: midneun salamdeul-iyeo naui jeoggwa neohui jeog-eul chingulo hayeo neohuiege dolaehan jinlileul geoyeoghago hananim-eulmidneunda hayeo seonjijawa neohui jasin deul-eul chubanghan geudeul-ege salang-eul be pullyeo haneunyo neohuiga naui gil-eseo seongjeonhago naui gippeum-eul chuguhalyeo handamyeon geudeul-ege salang-eul bepulji malla naneun neohuiga sumgineun geosgwa deuleonaeneun modeun geos-eul algo issnani ileohge haenghaneun ja nugudeun olbaleun gil-eseo beos-eonanila
